name: Mote o' Fire
effect: A mote of fire alights in your hand, hovering gently. The flame can be held for illumination, or thrown at an enemy within 30 feet. If thrown, roll for {{skills.accuracy}} again your target. On a hit, it takes 2d6 {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Arcane Flames
effect: Flowing flames surge from your outstretched hands, dealing 3d6 {{damage.heat}} damage to all creatures caught in the blaze.

name: Flame Armor
effect: Wreath your body in flame. The spell does not increase your {{BC}}, but causes enemies that start or end their turn next to you to take 1d12 {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Flaming Sword
effect: For one hour, A blade is imbued with the power of arcane fire. The blade deals 1d6 additional {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Fireball
effect: Hurl a blazing ball of fire which explodes upon impact. Roll for {{skills.accuracy}}

name: Incinerate
effect: An flame of exceptional heat deals 2d12 {{damage.heat}} damage to a target within 15 feet.

name: Create Lava
effect: Create a mass of lava, able to cover 100 square feet of terrain. Creatures which start or end their turn on lava take 3d6 {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Fire Elemental
effect: Summon a fire elemental. It knows the spells {{spells.mote_o_fire}}, {{spells.arcane_flames}} and {{spells.fireball}}, and has a continual flame cloak as if it had cast {{spells.flame_armor}}.

name: Flame Wall
effect: A wall of flames, 20 feet in height, surges up from scorched and blackened ground. Creatures which pass through the wall take 3d12 {{damage.heat}} damage. Any creatures standing where the wall is cast take 2d12 {{damage.heat}} damage.

name: Fire Storm
effect: Pure flame explodes from the caster bringing glorious devastation. The caster deals 4d20 {{damage.heat}} damage to all creatures within 50 feet.

name: Fire Golem
effect: The ritual summons a fire golem, the most volatile of the golems.
